property.name: scientificNameID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the nomenclatural (not taxonomic) details of a scientific name.

property.name: nomenclaturalCode
property.dc:description: The nomenclatural code (or codes in the case of an ambiregnal name) under which the scientificName is constructed. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

property.name: scientificName
property.dc:description: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. This term should not contain identification qualifications, which should instead be supplied in the identificationQualifier term.
property.examples: "Coleoptera" (order), "Vespertilionidae" (family), "Manis" (genus), "Ctenomys sociabilis" (genus + specificEpithet), "Ambystoma tigrinum diaboli" (genus + specificEpithet + infraspecificEpithet), "Roptrocerus typographi (Györfi, 1952)" (genus + specificEpithet + scientificNameAuthorship), "Quercus agrifolia var. oxyadenia (Torr.) J.T. Howell" (genus + specificEpithet + taxonRank + infraspecificEpithet + scientificNameAuthorship). For discussion see http://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/dwc:scientificName

property.name: scientificNameAuthorship
property.dc:description: The authorship information for the scientificName formatted according to the conventions of the applicable nomenclaturalCode.
property.examples: "(Torr.) J.T. Howell", "(Martinovský) Tzvelev", "(Györfi, 1952)". For discussion see http://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/dwc:scientificNameAuthorship

property.name: namePublishedIn
property.dc:description: A reference for the publication in which the scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated nomenclaturalCode.
property.examples: "Pearson O. P., and M. I. Christie. 1985. Historia Natural, 5(37):388", "Forel, Auguste, Diagnosies provisoires de quelques espèces nouvelles de fourmis de Madagascar, récoltées par M. Grandidier., Annales de la Societe Entomologique de Belgique, Comptes-rendus des Seances 30, 1886". For discussion see http://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/dwc:namePublishedIn

property.name: namePublishedInYear
property.dc:description: The four-digit year in which the scientificName was published.

property.name: originalNameUsage
property.dc:description: The taxon name, with authorship and date information if known, as it originally appeared when first established under the rules of the associated nomenclaturalCode. The basionym (botany) or basonym (bacteriology) of the scientificName or the senior/earlier homonym for replaced names.
property.examples: "Pinus abies", "Gasterosteus saltatrix Linnaeus 1768". For discussion see http://terms.tdwg.org/wiki/dwc:originalNameUsage

property.name: SynonymStatus
property.dc:description: This is equivalent and probably replaceable by dc:nomenclaturalStatus. Controlled vocabulary is recommended.
